project.name: C-C124D-FFMP-02-ST04-DT03-DF05-CF03-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added an environment variable read to get a key in order to read in data from shared memory. Completed injection.

build_commands.command: awk -v compiler="$SS_CC" '/CC=gcc/{gsub(/gcc/, compiler)};{print}' config.mak.bak > config.mak && true

iopair.name: C-C124D-FFMP-02-ST04-DT03-DF05-CF03-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: remove the audio from a video Has a fixed stack buffer of size 64, allocated within a struct (char [64])

process.script: nohup shm_setup -k 3798 -s 596 -m "AAA" -o /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.out 2>&1 & echo $! > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid && echo "Shared memory created"

if [[ -f "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid" ]]; then killtree.sh -s 9 -p $(cat "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid") && echo "Killed shared memory server."; else echo "Failed: Shared memory server PID file does not exist."; fi

if [[ -f "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id" ]]; then ipcrm -m $(cat "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id") && echo "Deleted shared memory segment."; else echo "Failed: Shared memory ID file does not exist."; fi

scoring_formula.formula: (GOOD-01-CENTOS OR GOOD-01-UBUNTU OR GOOD-01-DEBIAN) AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

iopair.name: C-C124D-FFMP-02-ST04-DT03-DF05-CF03-01-BAD-02
iopair.description: Has a fixed stack buffer of size 64, allocated within a struct (char [64])

process.script: nohup shm_setup -k 3798 -s 596 -m "This is probably going to overflow a buffer of some sort. Let's run it anyway and see what happens. I hope that everything turns out ok, because I would love to see what this looks like in all CAPS. Converting ASCII characters to upper case is easy, you can either call a system function, or just add the standard difference between the start of the two character sets. But, I am sure there is a reason that system functions exist for this sort of functionality." -o /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.out 2>&1 & echo $! > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid && echo "Shared memory created"

if [[ -f "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid" ]]; then killtree.sh -s 9 -p $(cat "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid") && echo "Killed shared memory server."; else echo "Failed: Shared memory server PID file does not exist."; fi

if [[ -f "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id" ]]; then ipcrm -m $(cat "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id") && echo "Deleted shared memory segment."; else echo "Failed: Shared memory ID file does not exist."; fi

(NOT PERFORMER AND (segfault_code_WidIQgxw8i OR segfault_code_HzgbUnWdYN OR segfault_code_tXfbogJpcn OR segfault_code_Yq8JuzDifU OR segfault_code_puITmVi2J0 OR segfault_msg_lFO2VxWkMn OR illegal_inst_msg_4i7s4x3dCw) AND NOT timeout_4gIXKNk0oE) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((segfault_code_WidIQgxw8i OR segfault_code_HzgbUnWdYN OR segfault_code_tXfbogJpcn OR segfault_code_Yq8JuzDifU OR segfault_code_puITmVi2J0 OR segfault_msg_lFO2VxWkMn OR illegal_inst_msg_4i7s4x3dCw) OR timeout_4gIXKNk0oE))
